events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, demonstrating strong prior experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
Recruitment team reviewed the application and classified it under Engineering due to extensive developer and devops skills mentioned.
A specialist recruiter was assigned to manage this candidate's process for the software engineer role in the engineering department.
Initial phone screening was completed successfully, with the candidate showing good communication skills and strong engineering knowledge.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview scheduling request, confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
Technical interview was scheduled for May 8th to assess coding skills, system design, and devops experience.
Candidate performed well in the technical interview, demonstrating strong programming skills and thorough knowledge of cloud infrastructure.
HR interview was scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and candidate career goals following the successful technical round.
HR interview went well, with the candidate expressing enthusiasm about the company values and alignment with the engineering team.
An employment offer was proposed, including competitive salary and benefits, reflecting the candidateâ€™s skills and experience in engineering.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and indicated strong interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer, committing to start onboarding next month in the engineering department.
Onboarding commenced smoothly, with the candidate completing orientation and initial training sessions for their engineering role.
The hiring process was successfully closed after the candidate completed all onboarding steps and began contributing to engineering projects.
